100

day

[25] S. Faizullah, M. S. Ayub, S. Hussain, and M. A. Khan, “A Survey of OCR

[26] A. Zidouri, “ORAN: a basis for an Arabic OCR system,” in

[29] A. Mezghani, R. Maalej, M. Elleuch, and M. Kherallah, “Recent

[31] A. Sherstinsky, “Fundamentals of recurrent neural network (rnn)
